text: The following are lists of waterfalls in the world by height, classified into two categories — natural and artificial. ==World's tallest natural waterfalls== Underwater falls, such as the Denmark Strait cataract, are not included. Each column (Waterfall, Height, Locality, Country) is sortable by using the up/down link in the column headings at the top of each column. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Waterfall !! Height !!
